Learn how BigCommerce helps you expand your reach and increase sales. Resources <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/resource-center/]]> | Log in <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login]]> The ultimate solution for omni-channel retailing LEARN MORE <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/blog/multichannel-selling-online-marketplace-considerations-to-boost-sales/]]> BigCommerce makes it easy for you to expand your reach and grow your sales
Retailers selling on two or more channels average twice the revenue as single-channel sellers. We have developed our platform as a hub for selling on social channels like Facebook and Pinterest, in person with Square and soon through marketplaces like eBay. Online store: Build a modern online store with a responsive design that looks and performs beautifully on desktops, laptops and mobile devices.
Physical store: Connect BigCommerce with the Square POS to have your inventory automatically updated whenever you make a sale, online or in person.
Social media: Shoppers can discover and buy your products on some of the world’s most popular social media platforms, including Facebook and Pinterest.
Online marketplaces: Get your products in front of millions of shoppers by listing on high-traffic marketplaces like Amazon and eBay.
